author: customer
text: Big scam be really careful! Ordered shoes for my son birthday( very expensive, almost £150) which he really wanted, he is size 6us right now but i took size 7us in case! when it’s came… it’s looks size 5, too small! On the end very disappointed as you can return or exchange if you want return you have to sale them for £40 so losing more than £100. Big scam!!!
title: Big scam be really careful

author: Yama Karim
text: The customer service is terrible.  I tried to cancel an order because it was super late and the seller had yet to send it for verification but they refused to answer my request.  This is clearly intentional.  This place is a scam!
title: The customer service is terrible

author: Andrew
text: I actually never got any shoes. The order was cancelled because they did not pass the checks. On one hand I am happy to have avoided getting scammed, however I still don't have the sneakers I desperately want!
title: I actually never got any shoes

author: Faiz
text: It has taken well over 20 days for my shoes to come. After all those ridiculous fees I paid? Insanity.
title: TAKES FOREVER

author: Adam Payne
text: Take your money and give you no updates. Can’t track your order or anything. Then when you do get it through they just refund with no reason. Awful service
title: Take your money and give you no…

author: Richard
text: Never got my first pair of shoes. It’s been almost 3 weeks & I still haven’t gotten the 2nd pair I ordered
title: Never got my any of the shoes

author: Chris McLeod
text: Nice idea of a website/company. Awful execution. From not fully refunding me, to not allowing me to sell, to cancelling orders without my knowledge. Don't let the nice idea tempt you, just go somewhere else.
title: Nice idea but terrible execution

author: Rafaela
text: You guys send me a fake shoes
title: You guys send me a fake shoes

author: Mel
text: Quick process once you confirm your purchase. Product was not in great condition, definitely disappointed. I would be careful purchasing in the future. Not a lot of communication through StockX either.
title: Not as expected

author: michelle
text: Double charged and 2 pair of shoes sent. One was charged a higher price for the same exact shoe. Contacted customer service but Noone has replied!!
title: Double charged and 2 pair of shoes…

author: Felicia
text: Shoes arrived bent and not in new like condition… very dissatisfied and will never purchase from stockx again
title: Shoes arrived bent and not in new like…

author: Edward Kim
text: The mobile app is glitchy.  I used PayPal and ended up ordering the same item 3 times. They wouldn’t refund the other two. Add insult to injury stockx took 15 days to deliver! Will never buy again.
title: Not Trust worthy

author: Em
text: It was my first time to shop at StockX and I guess the last time too. They would not let you cancel the order, change shoe size or return it.
title: It was my first time to shop at StockX…

author: Customer
text: I ordered a pair of sneakers. Never received them, went to check on the order & it says it was refunded without me getting anything. No merchandise or no email stating why the shoes were refunded.
title: I ordered a pair of sneakers

author: Steve Toner
text:
purchased a pair of Jordan 1 Mid Chicago toe, they have started to fall apart!! paid $449.32 
order # 28556455-28456214
very disappointed in the quality
title: purchased a pair of Jordan 1 Mid…

author: Brody
text: First order of shoes got rejected by authentication. Ordered again, this pair hasn’t showed up to their facility in over a week. Will never ever use this site again.
title: First order of shoes got rejected by…

author: Sherif
text: Poor pricing policy that only serves their seller interests
title: Poor pricing policy that only serves…

author: Wyatt Wood
text: I bought my Nike Dunks from here due to their promise of an authentic, quality product. Upon getting my shoes, the threading was all torn up, marks on the shoes, etc., that were unacceptable for a $300 price tag. After presenting this to StockX, they refused to help. Now i’m stuck with unwearable shoes. Won’t be buying from here again.
title: Not Worth It

author: FAZE
text: I received my Jordans and they were fake I need a refund and don't know how to go about it these are not legit....I bought two pairs for my son and husband
title: I received my Jordans and they were…

author: Mason
text: Taking forever to get my order .
title: Taking forever to get my order .
